textJp: 「で、その富竹氏の恋仲の女性が山中で焼死体に。
お隣の県警さんがあんまり協力的じゃなかったもんで、こっちはあまりよく状況を知らないんですがね。」
textEn: "And the burnt corpse of the woman Tomitake was in a relationship with was found in the mountains.
The neighboring Prefectural Police weren't very cooperative, so I don't know much about it, though."
"...Any sign it was a crime of gratification?"

textJp: 「司法解剖の結果、そういった痕跡は認められませんでした。
textEn: "According to the autopsy, there wasn't any indication of that.

textJp: ……わかったのは、薬物で昏睡させられてから、あの場所へ運ばれ、…腹部を切開。
意図的に臓器を引きずり出して、四方に散らして見せました。」
textEn: ...What we know is that she was rendered unconscious by some sort of drug, carried to that place, then had her abdomen sliced wide open.
Her organs were deliberately removed and scattered about."
